comments.raw_text:
It does work almost perfect, but doesn't suffice.
If you have more tabs open than fit into the line, the tab bar becomes scrollable horizontally. Your mouse scrolling then does not care if the selected tab is outside the visible area of the tabbar…
(For comparison: the browser will force the active tab to remain visible.)

Also, the destructor fixup seems to be unrelated (though correct).
